text: Palmyra is a borough of Lebanon County, in Pennsylvania, in the United States. It is near Harrisburg in the southeastern part of Pennsylvania. In 2020, the population of Palmyra was almost 7,830. Palmyra was settled during 1717. Its local council was formed in 1913. Category:Boroughs in Pennsylvania Category:1717 establishments Category:1710s establishments in the Thirteen Colonies Category:18th-century establishments in Pennsylvania
title: Palmyra, Pennsylvania
